actions.text: Amendment SA 1301 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 48 - 52. Record Vote Number: 243.

Amendment SA 1301 proposed by Senator Enzi for Senator Cantwell to Amendment SA 1116. (consideration: CR S6625-6626, S6628; text: CR S6626) To strike the reconciliation instructions for the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources of the Senate to prevent oil and gas development within the Arctic National Wildlife Refuge.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 1301 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 48 - 52. Record Vote Number: 243.
Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 1301 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 48 - 52. Record Vote Number: 243.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1301 proposed by Senator Enzi for Senator Cantwell to Amendment SA 1116.

amends_amendment.purpose: In the nature of a substitute.

purpose: To strike the reconciliation instructions for the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources of the Senate to prevent oil and gas development within the Arctic National Wildlife Refuge.
